Human Services Data Specification (HSDS) Schema - JSON

This is the schema for the HSDS format. It is available as an HTML list, JSON schema, as well as a YAML version of the schema, for different uses. If you are looking for a machine readable definition for the HSDS API, there is a separate OpenAPI Spec available for the project.

There Are A Handful Of Ways To Engage:
  • HTML Outline (current)
  • JSON Schema
  • YAML Schema
  • Discussion
  • Home
  • Terms of Service
  • Privacy Policy
  • About
